ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Su, As a friend of mine tells me in the SCA over and over as long as you are having fun and no one is hurt by it then by all means keep having fun.  But
ygData.messageBody:
Well Su,

As a friend of mine tells me in the SCA over and over as long as you are
having fun and no one is hurt by it then by all means keep having fun. But
the day it stops being fun is time to take a break for awhile and get back
to it when you are ready to have more fun.

Halyburton Bearhugger 32 Barb Shammy
Qapmoc 11 Half Elf Ranger
Doktari 7 High Elf Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryn

----- Original Message -----
From: "Su" <suceress@...>


>
> Heh. Since both of you said it, I'm more likely to remember it when I'm
> helping my mom do her shammy's epic.
> Right now I need to start on my own epic. People would love me if I had a
> click stick. And it would save so much mana. I swear I would rez anyone
who
> helped me for free forever. Oh wait, I rez most people for free anyways. I
> never ask for donations for it. I just occassionaly accept donations. If
the
> person is a friend I refuse donation. And if it was a really easy rez or I
> found the body or just offered to go do the rez without being asked I
refuse
> donation. Which would explain why I have no money. lol. I know, I'm not
the
> most aggressive or best player, but I enjoy the way I play.
> luv,
> -Su
